content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
7:00 - 7:15  | Morning Routine
7:15 - 12:00 | Help with Dialect (try and finish AWS migration)
12:00 - unknown | Out with friends

// ... Continue making timeblock when I get back; work on Internet Intention article; make precommitment to wake up at 7am

22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v2 (20:04)

```plain text
7:00 - 7:15  | Morning Routine
7:15 - 12:00 | Help with Dialect (try and finish AWS migration)
12:00 - 20:00 | Out with friends
20:00 - 20:10 | Create timeblock for rest of day
20:10 - 21:00 | Code up a small script to make precommitments to wake up at 7am
21:00 - 22:00 | Continue working on Dialect
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Fill out Sleep Log; Brush Teeth; Eat Breakfast
```

### Afternoon Routine

```plain text
13:00 - 13:30 | Walk/Office Hours
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```

## Generic Timeblock

These entries are intentionally vague (the specifics will be listed in the specific timeblocks above), but the general order of tasks/priority of tasks is outlined in the following generic timeblock:

```plain text
7:00 - 7:15   | Morning Routine
7:15 - 13:00  | Dialect work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
13:00 - 13:30 | Walk/Office Hours
13:30 - 19:15 | Precommit work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
19:15 - 20:40 | Side projects
20:40 - 22:00 | Buffer time (accounts for leisure time)
```
